name: Midsommar Torte
desc: A small cake made from Midsommar Berries. The cake base is first baked, then drizzled with berry jam and Smetana before being topped with a decorative Midsommar Berry. Its sweet taste and adorable appearance make it a small but popular surprise on festival days.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
